Package Server

package Server
  • Class
    Description
    DBCommand
    Enumeration of commands that can be issued to a database.
    DBController
    This class is a singleton design pattern which is responsible for connecting to a MySQL database and handle the data operations
    DeleteTimer
    This class extends Thread and overrides the run method.
    EchoServer
    This class overrides some of the methods in the abstract superclass in order to give more functionality to the server.
    ServerMethods
    ServerMethods class provides a method to send a message to a specific client connected to the server
    ServerUI
    This class represents the UI of the server application.
